biotools.summary: Simulate a wide range of genetic architectures and population structures in livestock. Large scale genotyping data and complex pedigrees can be efficiently simulated. It can also take into account predefined evolutionary features, such as LD, mutation, bottlenecks and expansions.

bioschemas.name: QMSIM
bioschemas.summary: Simulate a wide range of genetic architectures and population structures in livestock. Large scale genotyping data and complex pedigrees can be efficiently simulated. It can also take into account predefined evolutionary features, such as LD, mutation, bottlenecks and expansions.
